wordGroup: exchange memo 外汇兑换水单

sentences.en: According to the memo, this reported figure is only half of the real deposits.
sentences.cn: 根据备忘录上，这个公布的数字只有实际存款的一半。

sentences.en: The following appeared in a memo from the director of a large group of hospitals.
sentences.cn: 下述文字摘自一个大医院集团的主任的备忘录。

sentences.en: The following appeared in a memo from a budget planner for the city of Grandview.
sentences.cn: 以下文字摘自格兰德维尤的一位预算规划师的备忘录。
